segments.text: I see a woman standing by the sink, completely focused on drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t even notice the water overflowing all over the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddle, but she just keeps polishing that dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long the sink has been overflowing like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids behind her are up to something, but she’s totally oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t turned around yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and she’s acting like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is going to be a mess if someone doesn’t do something soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
